name: firefox-ctrlnumber
description: Adds keyboard shortcut Ctrl+1 to switch to the first tab, Ctrl+2 to switch to the second, and so on. Ctrl+9 switches to the last tab.

scripts.test: jsonlint --quiet *.json src/*.json && eslint . && web-ext lint --warnings-as-errors --no-input=true --source-dir src

author: AbigailBuccaneer
